name: IT 201 Sprint 3 (Jbramwell)
description:
This paint tool allows you to paint on the canvas set before you.

Features:

-Left Click to Draw & Right click to Delete

-Pressing the Red, Green, or Blue button will set it to said color.

-Pressing the Size button will set it to max size

-Pressing the Clear All button will clear all objects

-Switching the Timed Clear toggle will turn off/on timed clear which will clear all draw objects in 3 seconds
